    Michele Usuelli

    Mathematician by background, I love simplicity and applications to the real world. Currently working at Microsoft as a Principal Data Science Manager for Energy & Sustainability. I support large companies on their digital transformation by rapidly prototyping data science solutions, then deploying them into products with the help of the Azure cloud.
